targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  process_name AS 工程, 
  CAST(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT
  ) / COUNT(status) * 100 AS 完了率（％）
FROM
  scheduled_events
WHERE
  site_name = '${SiteName}'and $__timeFilter(due_date) 
GROUP BY
  process_name

SELECT
  machine_name AS 設備, 
  CAST(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT
  ) / COUNT(status) * 100 AS  完了率（％）
FROM
  scheduled_events
WHERE
  site_name = '${SiteName}' and process_name = '${ProcessName}' AND $__timeFilter(due_date)
GROUP BY
  machine_name
ORDER BY
  machine_name ASC

SELECT
  machine_name AS 設備,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 完了件数,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status NOT IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 未完了件数
FROM
  scheduled_events
WHERE
  not(machine_name = '')
  AND site_name = '${SiteName}' 
  AND process_name = '${ProcessName}'
GROUP BY
  machine_name
ORDER BY
  machine_name ASC;

SELECT name_and_part_number, AVG(part_total_qty) FROM change_histories WHERE site_name = '${SiteName}' and $__timeFilter(datetime) GROUP BY name_and_part_number ORDER BY AVG(part_total_qty) DESC LIMIT ${top}

SELECT
  process_name,
  status,
  COUNT(*) AS status_count
FROM
  scheduled_events
WHERE
  site_name = '${SiteName}'
GROUP BY
  process_name, status

WITH latest_stock AS (
    SELECT 
        name_and_part_number,
        total_qty_after,
        unit_price,
        site_name,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
            PARTITION BY name_and_part_number, site_name 
            ORDER BY datetime DESC
        ) AS rn
    FROM change_histories
    WHERE site_name = '${SiteName}'  -- 指定されたサイトのみ取得
)
SELECT 
    NOW()::timestamp AS "time",
    SUM(total_qty_after * unit_price) AS total_stock_value
FROM latest_stock
WHERE rn = 1;

WITH stock_changes AS (
    -- 指定 site_name のデータのみを取得
    SELECT 
        ch.name_and_part_number,
        ch.datetime::date AS date,  -- 明示的に datetime を date にキャスト
        ch.total_qty_after,
        ch.unit_price,
        ch.site_name
    FROM change_histories ch
    WHERE ch.site_name = '${SiteName}'
),
date_range AS (
    -- 日付の最小値・最大値を取得
    SELECT 
        MIN(date) AS min_date, 
        CURRENT_DATE AS max_date
    FROM stock_changes
),
date_series AS (
    -- すべての日付を作成（最小日付から最大日付まで）
    SELECT generate_series(min_date, max_date, '1 day'::interval)::date AS date
    FROM date_range
),
latest_stock AS (
    -- 各部品ごとに、その日までの最新の在庫データを取得
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (sc.name_and_part_number, d.date) 
        d.date,
        sc.name_and_part_number,
        sc.site_name,
        sc.total_qty_after AS latest_qty,
        sc.unit_price AS latest_price
    FROM date_series d
    JOIN stock_changes sc
    ON sc.date <= d.date
    ORDER BY sc.name_and_part_number, d.date, sc.date DESC
),
final_stock AS (
    -- 各日ごとの最新在庫数を適用
    SELECT 
        date,
        site_name,
        SUM(latest_qty * latest_price) AS total_stock_value
    FROM latest_stock
    GROUP BY date, site_name
)
SELECT 
    date AS "time",
    total_stock_value
FROM final_stock
WHERE site_name = '${SiteName}'
ORDER BY date;

panels.title: 在庫総金額の変動推移

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    name_and_part_number AS 商品名・型式, 
    AVG(part_total_qty) * AVG(unit_price) AS 部品別総額
FROM 
    change_histories
WHERE 
    site_name = '${SiteName}' 
    AND $__timeFilter(datetime)
GROUP BY 
    name_and_part_number
HAVING 
    AVG(part_total_qty) * AVG(unit_price) > 0
ORDER BY 
    部品別総額 DESC
LIMIT ${top};

panels.title: 部品別の総額（総数量ｘ単価）

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    name_and_part_number, 
    AVG(unit_price) AS 単価,
    CASE 
        WHEN AVG(part_total_qty) = 0 THEN 0 
        ELSE SUM(qty_change) / AVG(part_total_qty) 
    END AS 在庫回転率
FROM 
    change_histories
WHERE 
    site_name = '${SiteName}' 
    AND $__timeFilter(datetime)
GROUP BY 
    name_and_part_number
ORDER BY 
    単価 DESC, 在庫回転率 DESC
LIMIT 50;

panels.title: 部品単価 vs 在庫回転率

panels.description: 在庫変動数量/平均在庫数

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    name_and_part_number as 商品名（型式）, 
    CASE 
        WHEN AVG(part_total_qty) = 0 THEN 0 
        ELSE SUM(qty_change) / AVG(part_total_qty) 
    END AS 在庫回転率
FROM 
    change_histories
WHERE 
    site_name = '${SiteName}' AND 
    $__timeFilter(datetime)
GROUP BY 
    name_and_part_number
ORDER BY 
    在庫回転率 DESC
LIMIT ${top};
